channel.title: admin on Huijie's Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Huijie's Home Page

item.description: I am a Ph.D student in the field of Statistics at Cornell University supervised by Prof. Yang Ning. My research interests span widely on statistics, machine learning and optimization. Currently, I am particularly interested in theory and methodology in nonstandard settings. I also have experiences in graphical models, high-dimensional statistics, adversarial robust models and deep learning. Before my Ph.D, I received dual Bachelor’s degrees from Cornell University and Shanghai Jiao Tong University.
